description: This file defines an authentication context for a React application, providing authentication state and helper functions (login, logout, role checking) via React Context API. It manages authentication tokens and user data in localStorage, and handles unauthorized events.

methods.name: AuthProvider({ children })
methods.description: React component that provides authentication state and helper functions via context. Manages login state, token, user info, and handles authentication events.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Asynchronous function to perform login, store token and user info in localStorage, and update React state.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Asynchronous function to perform logout, remove token and user info from localStorage, and update React state.

methods.name: hasRole
methods.description: Checks if the current user roles include a specified role.
